title: Addiction Specialists Testify on Drug Use and Suicide Risk
description: Addiction specialists and others testified on drug use, suicide risk, and solutions for mental health treatment before the House Ways and Means Committee. Among the topics discussed were the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on mental health, stigmas associated with mental health treatment, providing increased mental health services, rising overdose deaths due to fentanyl, and border security and illegal drugs.
